settings.heading: Hear It from Our Satisfied Customers

settings.title: Versatile Applicators
settings.text: Equipped with four beauty applicators to target different areas of the face, body, and hair.

settings.title: Adjustable Dial
settings.text: Customize your treatment by easily increasing or decreasing the electrical current for optimal comfort.

settings.title: Effortless Maintenance
settings.text: Simple cleaning process - power off and wipe electrodes with a damp cloth and surface disinfectant.

settings.title: Quick & Easy Setup
settings.text: Quick and hassle-free - just plug in the device and apply your chosen applicator.

settings.heading: What Sets It Apart
settings.info_text:
Safety Considerations: 

Be sure to remove any metal jewelry before your treatment. Avoid using AHA or glycolic acid products with the high frequency wand. Avoid contact with broken capillaries, spider veins, and rosacea. Do not use high frequency during pregnancy. Never operate a high-frequency machine with a broken bulb. Always use a towel or tissue folded over the electrode to remove the electrodes and pull directly outward.

settings.title: Mashroom Tube
settings.text: Targets Wide Areas like Cheeks or Forehead

settings.title: Tongue Tube
settings.text: Precision for Small Areas like Eyes or Nose

settings.title: Bend Tube
settings.text: Targets Nasal Fossa or Facial Spots

settings.title: Comb Tube
settings.text: Designed for The Hair and Scalp

settings.heading: Step 1
settings.subheading: Insert the electrode into the wand
settings.text: Activate the device, and adjust the dial until you feel a subtle tingling sensation.

settings.heading: Step 2
settings.subheading: Move the wand in a circular motion
settings.text: Use circular motions while moving the wand over any blemishes for 1-3 minutes. Maintain a distance of up to ¼ inch from the skin for optimal results.

settings.heading: Step 3
settings.text: For targeted treatment on acne, spots or blemishes, tap the wand's tip against the lesion 2-3 times while continuing the circular motion.

settings.heading: Step 4
settings.text: Limit treatment to 3-5 min per specific area and no more than 20 min for the entire face. Once you’re done, remove the electrode from the wand by wrapping a towel or tissue around it and pulling straight out of the handle

settings.heading: Pain-Free & Effective SkinPetra High Frequency Therapy
settings.text: SkinPetra High Frequency Therapy represents our vision of turning intensely effective salon beauty procedures into accessible at-home treatments. Designed with your comfort and safety in mind, this device offers a completely pain-free experience. Tested and approved by dermatologists, even the highest frequency settings are 100% safe for your skin.
"SkinPetra High Frequency Therapy revolutionizes skincare with its accessible yet innovative technology, delivering professional-quality results at home.”
"A game-changing device that will absolutely transform your skin complexion. We just love a good self-care product and SkinPetra High Frequency Therapy is right up our alley."
“One single product that combines multiple salon treatments. You can’t possibly get a better deal!"
"SkinPetra High Frequency Therapy is our newest beauty secret. A must-have if you want to have your skin looking glowing. You will thank us 10 years later!"

settings.heading: In the Box
settings.text: No more endless skincare products or costly salon appointments. SkinPetra High Frequency Therapy comes with four tubes, offering targeted solutions for various skincare needs, all within the comfort of your home.

settings.title: Will SkinPetra High Frequency Therapy help me get rid of cystic acne?
settings.content: High-frequency therapy has been a trusted method used by estheticians for years, particularly in the treatment of acne. The current stimulates natural cleansing processes within the skin, successfully targeting existing acne. Additionally, neon gas within the device promotes the oxygenation of bacteria, while argon gas eliminates bacteria through UV light exposure. With consistent use, SkinPetra High Frequency Therapy can notably reduce the occurrence of future acne breakouts.

settings.title: Is it necessary to refill the gas?
settings.content: No, SkinPetra High Frequency Therapy does not require the replacement or refilling of gas. The device comes pre-filled with inert gasses, ensuring long-lasting performance without the need for maintenance or gas replenishment.

settings.title: How often should I use SkinPetra High Frequency Therapy?
settings.content: For optimal results, we recommend using SkinPetra High Frequency Therapy 2-3 times per week. However, frequency may vary based on individual skin concerns and your own personal goals. Start with a lower frequency and gradually increase as needed.

settings.title: Can SkinPetra High Frequency Therapy help with hair loss?
settings.content: By promoting blood circulation to the scalp and stimulating hair follicles, SkinPetra High Frequency Therapy encourages healthier hair growth and can definitely reduce hair loss. While individual results may vary, regular use of SkinPetra High Frequency Therapy can improve hair density, thickness, and overall scalp health.

settings.title: Is it safe to use SkinPetra High Frequency Therapy on other areas of my body?
settings.content: While SkinPetra High Frequency Therapy is primarily designed for facial use, it can also be used on other areas of the body, such as the neck, chest, or back, to address various skincare concerns.

settings.title: I’m a man and I have a beard. Can I still use SkinPetra High Frequency Therapy?
settings.content: Absolutely! SkinPetra High Frequency Therapy can be used on men with full beards. Simply maneuver the wand around facial hair to target desired areas without direct contact with the skin.

settings.title: Can SkinPetra High Frequency Therapy be used on all skin types?
settings.content: Yes, SkinPetra High Frequency Therapy therapy is suitable for all skin types. Whether you have oily, dry, combination, sensitive, or normal skin, you can incorporate this treatment into your skincare routine.

settings.title: Is SkinPetra High Frequency Therapy safe to use on my own?
settings.content: Absolutely! SkinPetra High Frequency Therapy is designed for at-home use and is equipped with safety features to ensure user comfort and protection. Our goal was to develop technology that delivers salon-like results and clinic-level safety in the comfort of your own home, making it accessible to everyone.

settings.title: Can SkinPetra High Frequency Therapy be used alongside other skincare products?
settings.content: Of course. SkinPetra High Frequency Therapy is the missing link of your existing skincare routine! It’s completely fine to keep using your usual skincare products. However, we recommend using SkinPetra High Frequency Therapy on clean, dry skin before applying other products for optimal absorption and effectiveness.

settings.title: How long will it take to see results from SkinPetra High Frequency Therapy?
settings.content: Results may vary depending on individual skin concerns and consistency of use. Typically, visible improvement starts showing in just 3 to 4 days! Continued use over time typically yields the best results.
